String.string: Please bring me what is inside the {@creature:46#7002#jermol extractor}.
What you brought me will be helpful for my research.

Pass through the {@creature:46#201#argonomorph kulkari crusher} guarding the rooms in {@Rgn:46003$$Raga Shadi} of {@Rgn:46001#the Three Towers} and break the {@creature:46#7002#jermol extractor}. Then collect the dead animals inside the extractor.
Go to the {@Rgn:46019$$Beastroar Chamber} and deliver the dead animals to {@linkcreature:246#1025$$Alecian}
